scripts.scss:dev: mkdir -p dist/css && npm run scsslint && node-sass --source-map-embed true -o dist/css src/scss
scripts.scss:build: mkdir -p dist/css && node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/css src/scss
scripts.css:dev: yarn run scss:dev && yarn run autoprefixer
scripts.css:build: yarn run scss:build && yarn run autoprefixer
scripts.js:dev: mkdir -p dist/js && babel src/js/*.js -o dist/js/script.js --source-maps inline
